entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 05:44 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Snow
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: WNW 23 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Rain showers early this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
